title: Faker crying on stream after trying New Leblanc
body:
#Community Triggered

No seriously, we want the Old Leblanc Back, this is just a joke of a Rework.

replies.body: U mean old LB and her interactive 0.1second reaction time before you are dead when you see her if she has more than 50 AP? no thanks.

You know, it was never Assassins fault for killing someone too quickly, it's because you don't itemize against them.
You expect building AD and Crit and expect to be tanky like everyone?
Hey I'm building Banshee why don't you build it too?

Even with banshee's 70MR and 300HP Leblanc can still one shot you and building more than one defensive item on a damage champion just makes you useless compared to other damage dealers late game so might as well just go for damage. Also I rarely play ADC and leblanc had some serious health issues you can't tell me otherwise she was one of the most toxic, safe and hard snowballing assassins in the game.

You know its a Team game, there is a support on a team who can peel, I've seen good Thresh Shutdown Leblanc extremely Hard, you're not suppose to go inside the enemie jungle and expect to 1vs 1 against Leblanc and comes out alive. She has  job and its a very very specific job, remove Priority Target. If she cannot do that she is useless.

>  She has job and its a very very specific job, remove Priority Target. If she cannot do that she is useless.

And thats exactly why she got changed? She either ruins the whole entire game for someone or she can't do anything for her team. That is not healthy gameplay. Now she has some AOE damage, more ways to play around her stealth and healthier gameplay overall. No, she isn't what she used to be, no she is not the one shot champion anymore and no they won't turn her rework back.

Well now she is not Healthy for herself aswell as for her Team. She is useless? In a sense that she gets a reverse threatment, instead of bursting someone in 0.5sec she get bursted down by a Twitch, Lee sin, Veigar, Ryze in 0.5sec.
u mad bro stop crying and deal with it
lol what peopel get all butt hurt cause they have try in a sense and cant do what they used to do

The thing is assassins are unhealthy by definition. Their job is to 100-0 squishies and then GTFO. They don't provide utility, they don't soak up damage, and they don't mow down objectives. The only thing they provide is the deletion of high priority targets. If they can't deliver that, which for the most part they now can't, then they're useless. 

If you want to make an argument that assassins as a class shouldn't exist, you'd have a point and maybe I'd even side with you. It doesn't feel fair to get deleted and it's specially frustrating to pretty much have your existence hinge on the other people of your team keeping you safe (and we know how reliable your team of randoms usually is). I mostly play immobile ADCs or squishy mages (like Jinx and Zyra) so I know all about that. 

But the thing is, assassins ARE part of the game and Riot obviously wants to keep them in it. They didn't give utility to assassins or tools to contribute to the team ways other than killing people, they just dulled those tools to prevent them from doing their job efficiently. They simply made assassins useless. And ironically enough that hasn't even fixed your griefs about being deleted. Burst mages can and will still 100-0 you as just as much as before, at range, all the while still providing utility in the form of CC and zoning. Do you think being jumped by Akali is bad? Being Tibber'ed by Annie or blown up half a screen away by Syndra isn't that much better. And guess what, assassins were the counter to them. To say nothing of divers. Vis and Dianas are still just as capable of jumping onto and blowing up ADCs as assassins while being tanky enough to go toe to toe with the rest of your team.
ikr i love hearing people complain about the new rework lol saying it sucks, and i im like whats the matter you cant kill someone in .1 secs anymore.
